artist: RMS SALES Corp., East Orange, New Jersey
inscription:
Inscription; Lenders Sticker

on spaceship, vertically: [UNITED STATES]; on base: [NEW YORK/ WORLD's FAIR/ 1964-1965]; inside rim of base: [UNISPHERE/ PRESENTED BY/ (circle with USS)/ UNITED STATES STEEL/ (Copyright symbol) 1961/ NEW YORK WORLD's FAIR 1964-1965 CORPORATION/ MFG. BY/ RMS SALES CORP/ EAST ORANGE, NJ]
markings: Sticker on bottom, in ink: [New York World's/ Fair 1964-1965/ 7650 560]
title: New York World's Fair Bank mechanical bank
